Key Match Events: Slovakia took advantage of a defensive error to score an early goal.
Romelu Lukaku had two goals ruled out by VAR for offside and handball.
The match saw the first major shock result of Euro 2024.
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium faced issues scoring after the initial goal, highlighting their tournament struggles.
The VAR decisions were the most contentious of the tournament so far.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the biggest upset in Euro 2024 history statistically.
Slovakia's victory gave them a strong position in Group E.
